questions: Step 1: Set up a project folder with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files.
Step 2: In the HTML file, create a container to display the quote text and a button to generate a new quote.
Step 3: Style the container and button using CSS to make the quotes generator visually appealing.
Step 4: In the JavaScript file, create an array of quotes where each quote is an object with properties for the quote text and the author.
Step 5: Write a function in JavaScript that selects a random quote from the array each time the button is clicked and displays it in the container.
Step 6: (Optional) Add animations or transitions to the quotes container to enhance the user experience when a new quote is displayed.
